description:
This proof documents a simple meal taken after completing morning farm work at MaMeeFarmâ„¢ on January 4, 2026.

The image shows a bowl of instant noodles consumed as breakfast by MaMee and Pâ€™To, with one bowl per person.

Captured at 11:17 AM (Asia/Bangkok), the record reflects real-life conditions of daily labor, energy recovery after physical work, and subsistence-level resource management within the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

This proof does not represent comfort or abundance, but documents actual living conditions aligned with real labor output.
